alert.note: Alert for Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 08 at 4:32AM CST until March 10 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches possible. * WHERE...In the central and northern Nebraksa Panhandle... Dawes... Box Butte... Scotts Bluff... Morrill... and Southern Sioux Counties to include Scottsbluff...Alliance. * WHEN...From this afternoon through late Wednesday night. * IMPACTS...Dangerous travel conditions possible due to icy, snow packed roads and reduced visibilities in falling and blowing snow. The cold wind chills as low as 15 below zero could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.

area.areaDesc: Box Butte; Morrill; Scotts Bluff; South Sioux
